hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Thursday Green - A Park View
hiveArticle.body:
My entry for today's #colorchallenge is a view in Park. The image was taken in Deen Dayal Park in Udaipur, Rajasthan, India.
<hr>
View in Park
<hr>

<hr>
Camera : Nokia 6
